rows.label: tev013601_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Leroy about the device Lin is working on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Leroy if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Leroy about Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Leroy about the Skell flight module.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ever since we arrived on Mira, Lin's been trying to
create a device that will give Skells flight capabilities.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0003
rows.name:
She claims this device will allow any Skells to fly freely.
It's been something of an obsession of hers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0004
rows.name:
I sure hope she's able to finish it soon.
All of BLADE is rooting for her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0005
rows.name: And yeah, our test pilot, Doug, is always complaining.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0006
rows.name:
But he keeps participating in tests no matter how
dangerous they are, so I know he feels the same.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0007
rows.name:
He's the type who likes to keep his feelings hidden.
If I ever mention it, he gets embarrassed and then tells
me I'm a noob who doesn't know anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0010
rows.name:
As a member of the Outfitters division,
field-testing Skells is part of my job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0011
rows.name:
But even with the newest models, I can barely hold
my own against a blatta.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0012
rows.name:
I do fine on test exercises, but when I'm faced with a
real live indigen, I always end up panicking.
I know it's all in my head, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0013
rows.name:
well, I guess I've always been a coward.
Having to battle indigens is just too much for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0014
rows.name:
And it's not like I'm any better off the battlefield.
I've never even had the guts to ask a girl out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0015
rows.name:
I'm so disgusted with myself...
I don't know what to do anymore.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0023
rows.name:
Has Commander Vandham put you through Skell
training yet? Then once you have a license...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0024
rows.name:
Hey! Maybe you could fill in for Doug once or twice!
You know? Just to help Lin with her experiments?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0025
rows.name:
If someone doesn't step in and give Doug a break,
his mimeosome is going to totally come apart.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0026
rows.name:
...Huh? Why don't I do it? Well, I...I mean...
Yeah, I probably should, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0027
rows.name:
Just the thought of doing something so dangerous
has my knees trembling. For a coward like me,
it's pretty much out of the question.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0042
rows.name: Lin finally finished! Man, she really is incredible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0043
rows.name:
...Huh? You're asking if I'm going to buy a Skell
with a flight module?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0044
rows.name:
Nope! No way. Nuuuuh-uh. Nope, nope, nope.
Doug suggested the same thing, but I don't care.
Flying is where I draw the line.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0045
rows.name:
I mean, come on! I'm terrified of heights!
If I were to fly around like that, I might pass out.
And then...CRASH! Bye-bye, Skell. Bye-bye, Leroy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0046
rows.name:
Doug is always telling me to grow a pair,
but I'll never have courage like he does.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0047
rows.name:
I think my problem was that I never understood what
it means to be in love.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0048
rows.name:
I always thought the reason I couldn't ask out girls I
liked was because I was a coward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0049
rows.name:
But if I were really in love, I wouldn't have let
anything get in the way of pursuing someone.
I see that now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0050
rows.name: And I owe it all to the love of my life, Lavina![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0051
rows.name:
The Prone are huge, and they still scare me,
but I'm not going to let that stop me.
She will be my wife![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Leroy about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0052
rows.name:
Commander Vandham put you through Skell training
himself? Then once you have a license...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0053
rows.name:
Hey! Maybe you could fill in for Doug once or twice!
You know? Just to help Lin with her experiments?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0054
rows.name:
If someone doesn't step in and give Doug a break,
his mimeosome is going to totally come apart.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0055
rows.name: ...Huh? Why don't I do it myself?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0056
rows.name:
You know what? You're right. If I let my fear stop me
from doing things like that, I'll never earn my
father-in-law's respect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0057
rows.name:
All right, I'll do it! I'll show everyone how much I've
changed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0060
rows.name:
My father-in-law has been training me in the art of
combat every day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0061
rows.name:
He's a fantastic teacher. He knows a lot of unique
combat tactics that aren't part of BLADE's curriculum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0062
rows.name:
The Prone really are incredible. I guess you pick up a
few things by being at war for 10,000 years.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0063
rows.name:
I'm going to master all of their techniques and become
as strong as you. Then I'll be the sort of man who can
protect my Lavina from anything![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0071
rows.name: Lin finally finished! Man, she really is incredible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0072
rows.name:
...Huh? You're asking if I'm going to buy a Skell
with a flight module?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0073
rows.name:
Yeah, I dunno. I mean, Doug also said I should get
one, but... Hmm. I guess I should think about it, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0074
rows.name:
To be honest, I'm completely terrified of heights.
But if I let that sort of thing stop me, I'll never be
the sort of man who can protect Lavina![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0075
rows.name: That's the spirit, Leroy! Spoken like a real man.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0076
rows.name:
Hey, thanks, Doug! I guess Lavina finally made
something out of me, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0077
rows.name: Maybe you should get yourself a girlfriend, Doug![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0078
rows.name:
Hey, mind your own goddamn business!
...And don't do anything stupid and make a widow
out of that precious girlfriend of yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0083
rows.name:
I can't wait to see the look on Doug's face when he
sees how much I've changed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_SEL3011
rows.name: Ask Leroy about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0084
rows.name:
I'm sorry for dragging you into this thing with Lavina.
But thanks to you, my eyes are finally open.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0085
rows.name:
You can't steal your way into someone's heart.
You've got to be forthright and honest about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0086
rows.name:
My father-in-law, Loda Gorida, gave me a chance to
prove myself worthy, and I haven't succeeded yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013601_MSG0087
rows.name:
But I'm going to work hard to become as strong as
you and earn his respect![ST:wait ]
